publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4132 Stewart Stevenson: E85 Biofuel—That the Parliament notes the pilot introduction in Somerset, England, of E85 fuel, which is largely ethyl alcohol distilled from renewable resources and hence is nearly carbon neutral, and calls on the Scottish Executive to promote a pilot in Scotland which will have the benefits of raising awareness, moving local production of ethyl alcohol for fuel closer to being commercially attractive and giving Scottish farmers a new cash crop by growing a range of raw materials which may feed the distillation process. Supported by: Rob Gibson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mike Pringle*, Fergus Ewing*, Jim Mather*, Ms Sandra White*, Brian Adam*, Christine Grahame*

S2M-4132 Stewart Stevenson: E85 Biofuel—That the Parliament notes the pilot introduction in Somerset, England, of E85 fuel, which is largely ethyl alcohol distilled from renewable resources and hence is nearly carbon neutral, and calls on the Scottish Executive to promote a pilot in Scotland which will have the benefits of raising awareness, moving local production of ethyl alcohol for fuel closer to being commercially attractive and giving Scottish farmers a new cash crop by growing a range of raw materials which may feed the distillation process. Supported by: Rob Gibson, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Mr Andrew Welsh, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Mike Pringle, Fergus Ewing, Jim Mather, Ms Sandra White, Brian Adam, Christine Grahame, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr David Davidson*, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-4132 E85 Biofuel (lodged on 16 March 2006) Chris Ballance*
S2M-4132 E85 Biofuel (lodged on 16 March 2006) Alex Neil*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Donald Gorrie*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-4132 E85 Biofuel (lodged on 16 March 2006) Richard Lochhead*, Frances Curran*
S2M-4132 E85 Biofuel (lodged on 16 March 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Patrick Harvie*
S2M-4132 E85 Biofuel (lodged on 16 March 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4132 E85 Biofuel (lodged on 16 March 2006) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-4132 E85 Biofuel (lodged on 16 March 2006) Mr Jamie Stone*
